languages.text: {n}Среди аристократов, окружающих пышно наряженного Драйвстема, вы замечаете пару молодых дворян в цветах семей Зауэрбэк и Гапрак. Видимо, главные дворянские семейства Даргонуса решили представить свету свою молодежь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Среди аристократов, окружающих пышно наряженного Драйвстема, вы замечаете пару молодых дворян в цветах семей Зауэрбек и Гапрак. Видимо, главные дворянские семейства Даргонуса решили представить свету свою молодежь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди аристократов, окружающих пышно наряженного Драйвстема, вы замечаете пару молодых дворян в цветах семей Зауэрбэк и Гапрак. Видимо, главные дворянские семейства Даргонуса решили представить свету свою молодежь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Urbend, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colors. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their youth to high society.{/n}

{n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Urbend, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colors. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their youth to high society.{/n}

{n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

{n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

{n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

languages.text: {n}豪奢な装いのドライブステムを囲む貴族たちの中に、ザウアーバック家とギャプラック家の色を身につけたふたりの若い貴族がいるとことに気づく。ダルゴナスの主要貴族はこの若い世代を上流社会に紹介することに決めたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}豪奢な装いのドライブステムを囲む貴族たちの中に、ザウアーバック家とギャプラック家の色を身につけたふたりの若い貴族がいるとことに気づく。ダルゴナスの主要貴族はこの若い世代を上流社会に紹介することに決めたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔穿着华美的服饰，身边围绕着许多贵族。在他们之中，你注意到了来自苏尔贝克家族与贾帕克家族的年轻贵族。看来，达戈努斯的主要贵族家族已经决定带着他们的年轻成员参加上流社会的交际圈。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔穿着华美的服饰，身边围绕着许多贵族。在他们之中，你注意到了来自苏尔贝克家族与贾帕克家族的年轻贵族。看来，达戈努斯的主要贵族家族已经决定带着他们的年轻成员参加上流社会的交际圈。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre los aristócratas que rodean al opulento Drivestem ves a un par de jóvenes ataviados con los colores de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak. Parece que las grandes familias nobles de Dargonus han aprovechado la ocasión para presentar a sus miembros más jóvenes en la alta sociedad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre los aristócratas que rodean al opulento Drivestem ves a un par de jóvenes ataviados con los colores de las casas Sauerback y Gaprak. Parece que las grandes familias nobles de Dargonus han aprovechado la ocasión para presentar a sus miembros más jóvenes en la alta sociedad.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi les aristocrates qui entourent Drivestem, vous remarquez deux jeunes nobles drapés dans des tenues aux couleurs des Sauerback et des Gaprak. Il semblerait que les familles nobles majeures de Dargonus aient décidé d'introduire leurs membres les plus jeunes dans la haute société.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Parmi les aristocrates qui entourent Drivestem, vous remarquez deux jeunes nobles drapés dans des tenues aux couleurs des Sauerback et des Gaprak. Il semblerait que les familles nobles majeures de Dargonus aient décidé d'introduire leurs membres les plus jeunes dans la haute société.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unter den Aristokraten, die den opulent gekleideten Drivestem umringen, bemerkst du einige junge Adlige in den Farben von Sauerback und Gaprak. Anscheinend haben die wichtigen Adelsfamilien von Dargonus beschlossen, ihre jüngeren Mitglieder in die höhere Gesellschaft einzuführen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unter den Aristokraten, die den opulent gekleideten Drivestem umringen, bemerkst du einige junge Adlige in den Farben von Sauerback und Gaprak. Anscheinend haben die wichtigen Adelsfamilien von Dargonus beschlossen, ihre jüngeren Mitglieder in die höhere Gesellschaft einzuführen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Şatafatlı bir biçimde giyinmiş Drivestem'in çevresindeki aristokratlardan birkaçının, Sauerback ve Gaprak üniformalı genç soylular olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Dargonus'un büyük soylu aileleri, nihayet genç fertlerini sosyeteye tanıtmaya karar vermiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the aristocrats surrounding the opulently dressed Drivestem, you notice a couple of young nobles in Sauerback and Gaprak colours. It would seem that the major noble families of Dargonus have decided to introduce their younger members to high society.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Şatafatlı bir biçimde giyinmiş Drivestem'in çevresindeki aristokratlardan birkaçının, Sauerback ve Gaprak üniformalı genç soylular olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Demek ki Dargonus'un büyük soylu aileleri, nihayet genç fertlerini sosyeteye tanıtmaya karar vermiş.{/n}
